FuncDef: Specifies the aging time for remotely learned MAC addresses in the forwarding database (FDB) for the Virtual Private LAN Service (VPLS) instance. In a VPLS service, MAC addresses are associated with a Service Access Point (SAP) or with a Service Distribution Point (SDP). MACs associated with a SAP are classified as local MACs, and MACs associated with an SDP are remote MACs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the aging time for remote MACs expressed in seconds. Values-60 to 86400.

ExtraInfo: Default: remote age 900 - Remote MACs aged after 900 seconds
